ygData.subject: Kelethin Rogue Guild
ygData.msgSnippet: I was wondering if anyone had completed the 2nd of the two guildmasters quests in the rogue guild in kelethin?  I have done the first one long ago, where you
ygData.messageBody:
I was wondering if anyone had completed the 2nd of the two guildmasters
quests in the rogue guild in kelethin? I have done the first one long ago,
where you bring him 2 gp's and 2 rusty daggers, when i talk to the other guy
however, he asks if you are a new adventurer or something of that sort, and
if you say, yes, i am a new adventurer he'll say no, can't give a quest to
someone that inexperienced, or something of the like. If you try to say
that you are not new, he still will not give you it, but merely repeats
himself. I either can't find out what to say to him, or the quest is
broken, just curious

Rebequa
15th Rogue
Cazic-Thule
